job_history.work_description: Service and maintain numerous makes, models and types of equipment, including client servers, workstations, laptops and peripherals. Install and maintain CCTV-DVR Camera systems, Servers, network racks/patch panels, VoIP, BDR data recovery systems of which I am familiar with StorageCraft, Datto, VEEAM and Intronis, and business class cloud backup solutions.

Responsible for all maintenance on 55 Windows variant based workstations, Dell Precision server, IBM xSeries Blade server, the telephony/VOIP/POTS systems, T1/network troubleshooting in a multi-building environment as well as providing end user assistance and training to sales, service and management teams.
Perform field service work on IBM servers, IBM/Lenovo desktops and IBM Point-of-Sale POS) equipment as well as repair Lexmark monochrome and color laser printers.

job_history.role_name: Kodak Imaging Expert / Field Marketing Specialist
job_history.work_description: I was responsible to engage and train sales associates and customers in large retail stores by organizing training events, presentations and role playing demonstrations.
Worked for several divisions of ActionLink concurrently: Merchandising, Marketing and Training.
Retail sales of digital, 35mm, and DSLR cameras and accessories.
Retail sales of computers, office supplies, electronics and related peripherals.
